description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fbos4","text":"Method used to derive single cell suspension from P1 mouse kidneys on ice, generating a cell suspension with greatly reduced artifact gene expresion changes and suitable for downstream analysis using 10x Chromium or DropSeq. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"50jg0","text":" Storage Conditions of Reagents  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":31}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a7nec","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"38cmv","text":" Required Equipment ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":8,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4afq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5hh73","text":" The protocol workflow is as follows:  A. Isolate Kidney B. Initial digestion: triturate on ice C. Perform gentleMACS  D. Continue triturating on ice F. Preparing cells for Chromium/DropSeq ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":7,"length":37}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6pjk","text":" BEFORE STARTING Prepare Bacillus Licheniformis enzyme mix just prior to starting dissociation: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":21,"length":78},{"style":"italic","offset":29,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6uoro","text":" Volume (µl) Reagent  Final concentration   894  DPBS  1X  1  0.5 M EDTA  0.5 mM  5  DNAse 1 (250 U/10 μL)  125 U / mL  100 B. Lich (100 mg/mL)  10 mg/mL ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":3,"length":11},{"style":"bold","offset":15,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":23,"length":21},{"style":"italic","offset":135,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":167}],"data":{}},{"key":"245od","text":" +25 mg tissue / 1 mL enzyme mix ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":31}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9fsc","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2b759","text":"To prepare 0.01% BSA/PBS:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ncj8","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2r9i2","text":"Make stock of 10% BSA in DPBS and store at -20 °C. To make PBS/BSA 0.01% aliquot 50 mL of DPBS in 50 mL conical and pipet in 50 µL of 10% BSA stock.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":148}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3u2o0","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dnkbh","text":"Prepare 10% FBS/PBS with heat-inactivated FBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":46}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21jbh","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qo0j","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":[200,200],"data":[["Reagent","Storage Condition "],["DPBS (Thermofisher, 14190144) ","4°C "],["1 M CaCl2","room temp. keywords: CAP, cold-active protease, bacillus licheniformis, single cell dissociation, kidney
manuscript_citation: Psychrophilic proteases dramatically reduce single-cell RNA-seq artifacts: a molecular atlas of kidney development

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1g8l4","text":"Mince kidneys on top of petri dish, on ice, using razor blade.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fabe","text":"Weigh out 25 mg of tissue for each tube of B. Lich. enzyme mix (2 tubes total). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cask6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93r2u","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"25","guid":"75DCE4FE38CC4B4B90013B4854206275","id":"87022","label":"","unit":"5"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ct0ia","text":"Incubate tissue + enzyme on ice for 7 minutes while triturating 15 strokes using 1 mL pipet every 2 minutes set to 700 µL - first with tip cut off.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5uiin","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dqmh5","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bn6k9","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"420","guid":"ED67C2741B28400AB0CAD273EC2913E5","id":"78696","label":"","preset":[]}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"120","guid":"0A18E7916EF8468C9170AC5E38087676","id":"78697","label":"","preset":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"54j3t","text":"After 7 minutes, take the digest mix (combine the two tubes) and pipet into Miltenyi C-tube (placed on ice); take C-tube to gentleMACS placed in 4° cold room. Run program brain_03 two times. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b6tdb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ieb1","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"241A0BAE82164E2F92CB1B174F94689F","id":"47954","label":"","temperature":"4","unit":"10"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"epcg3","text":"After MACS, briefly quick spin the MACS tube (to 300 G) at 4 °C to ensure contents are in the bottom of the tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ca0of","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bq454","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"40A3AA6DF6244BFCABFC61398D3BD822","id":"47955","label":"","temperature":"4","unit":"10"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"65hma","text":"Re-suspend and visualize cells using scope by taking small aliquot and using a slide; continue digesting cells in C-tube on ice for 8 additional minutes while triturating every 2 min 15 strokes using a 1 mL pipet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"erf2r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"tmv2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"sehp","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"480","guid":"8B2B84048356447C99829EDC665C06D8","id":"78699","label":"","preset":[]}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"120","guid":"768FCF1148464B5B93622CF323F16F5F","id":"78700","label":"","preset":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6hk69","text":"Add 3 mL ice-cold 10% FBS/PBS to digest mix in C-tube to inhibit the protease. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dggl6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1633l","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"3","guid":"81B51106493449F8A6DBD5D229F0DA83","id":"87023","label":"ice-cold 10% FBS/PBS","unit":"2"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"39cld","text":"Transfer digest mix to a 15 mL conical. Spin 300 G for 5 minutes at 4 °C; discard supernatant; re-suspend cell pellet in 2 mL ice-cold PBS/BSA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ceari","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dsi98","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9otgk","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5dalj","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"AD1C568BCE654901B1DFEF54E2AEED30","id":"47956","label":"","temperature":"4","unit":"10"}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"97892FF5BD524210B0292EBCD15E51A4","id":"78701","label":"300 g spin","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"2","guid":"F6A7A5FCC2C041FF9CCBC0048AD573CC","id":"87024","label":"re-suspend in PBS/BSA","unit":"2"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ii8q","text":"Filter re-suspended cells using 30 uM filter on sterile 15 mL conical on ice - rinse filter with 8 mL ice-cold PBS/BSA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17ovt","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4fs1","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"8","error":false,"guid":"73D507A0C8F4434F94885017773C4769","id":"87025","label":"rinse filter with PBS/BSA","unit":"2"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5rdk0","text":"Spin 15 mL conical tube containing filtered cells 300 G for 5 minutes at 4 °C; discard supernatant and re-suspend pellet in 10 mL ice-cold PBS/BSA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6iaoa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2n8ju","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"agmra","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f3bs2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"2F806479B9C349ABAF6FDA717B873053","id":"47957","label":"","temperature":"4","unit":"10"}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"36B1CE2825364E32A8C1EBF3814B9F8A","id":"78702","label":"300 g spin","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","guid":"58DBAD44B9F64A23B12371867F5A08BD","id":"87026","label":"PBS/BSA","unit":"2"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"h1o1","text":"Remove supernatant and re-suspend in 1-2 mL ice-cold PBS/BSA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f351h","text":"Examine using hemocytometer and adjust concentration to 100 cells/uL for DropSeq or 1,000 cells/µL for 10X Chromium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
